Package es.upm.pproject.parkingjam.parking_jam.view

Class MovableCar

java.lang.Object
es.upm.pproject.parkingjam.parking_jam.view.MovableCar
public class MovableCar extends Object
MovableCar represents a car that can be moved on the board. This class manages its graphical representation and the logic of movements

  • Constructor Details

    • MovableCar

      public MovableCar(Car car, int rows, int cols, int squareSize, Grid grid, Controller controller, MainFrame mf, String image)
      MovableCar's Constructor
      Parameters:
      car - The Car object that represents this car
      rows - Number of rows in the board
      cols - Number of columns in the board
      squareSize - Size of each cell in the board
      grid - The panel where the car is drawn
      controller - The game controller
      mf - The mainframe of the application
      image - Name of the car's image
